column1: Run Ball - Jump On Helix Road
column2:
Exciting adventure trip of climbing helix tower!
Tap to jump, make your ball jump over the pits and obstacles, earn diamonds and unlock new interesting balls.

Easy one-tap controls, rich visual effects and addictive gameplay.
Beat your high score and compete with others to hit the best score in the world!

THEY TOOK YOUR CITY.  THEY SHOULD’VE TAKEN YOUR CAR!

Reclaim your No.1 position as you blast past other players and outrageous gang bosses in Fastlane: Road to Revenge!

Pick-up this FREE classic arcade shooter and play anytime OFFLINE!

BUST OUT THE BIG GUNS
• 20 exotic cars to collect and upgrade.
• 10 unique & powerful UAVs.
• Game changing vehicle transformations to rain destruction on your rivals: Talon Gunship, Vulcan S-22, Tempest C-3.
• More gear and gadgets than Elon Musk!

CHALLENGE PLAYERS WORLDWIDE
• Blast your way past players the world over.
• Overtake rivals to steal their score bonus.
• Race through 30 player leagues with escalating difficulty. 
• Challenging environments and lethal obstacles.
• Can you reclaim your status as top boss?

RICH STORY CAMPAIGN
• 11 crazed bosses out to stop you in your tracks.
• Complete the campaign and reveal the identity of the boss who took over your turf.

HUGE SOUNDTRACK
• Actual in-game radio allows you to select your own beats.
• Wide selection of in-game music.
• Customize your own game soundtrack.


Please note that Fastlane is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases. You can play Fastlane offline but a network connection is required for in-app purchases and League Promotion.

Fastlane also offers a 1 month auto-renewable subscription to 'Jobs Hustle'  which recharges in-game Jobs 100% faster.
– Subscription payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

_____________________________________________
Fastlane will work on the following devices:
• iPad 3 and above.
• iPhone 5 and above.
• iPad mini 2 and above.
_____________________________________________


WE WANT YOUR FEEDBACK!
Visit our Fastlane community page and speak to us directly!  We want to hear your ideas and any issues:
http://links.spaceapegames.com/fastlaneband

Visit our official site at http://www.fastlaneroadtorevenge.com/
Follow us on Twitter or like us on Facebook to get info about upcoming Fastlane changes:
https://www.facebook.com/fastlaneroadtorevenge/
https://twitter.com/FastlaneRTR/

Privacy Policy: http://www.spaceapegames.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: http://www.spaceapegames.com/terms-conditions/

"Call it an unfair bias, but I wasn’t expecting a free-to-play game to look this good." - 148Apps review

ABOUT MONSTER SHOOTER 

Just when you thought it couldn't get any better... it did! We took the dual-stick shooter formula and optimized it to deliver the best game we could: Monster Shooter, the new dual-stick mayhem sensation!

IT'S FREE TO PLAY! 
Download the game free of charge and prove that you can handle the best mission and progress system. Visit numerous levels across three different planets and enjoy hours of free gameplay! 

IT LOOKS AND SOUNDS GREAT! 
Hand-drawn 2D ultra violence has never looked this cute. With a vast array of enemies, guns and effects, Monster Shooter is one of the best-looking games of its genre which also runs smoothly on older devices. 

WEAPONS AND GEAR KICK BUTTS! 
Never underestimate a guy whose cat has been stolen by aliens. As DumDum, you can blast your enemies with shotguns, plasma rifles and rocket launchers and spice things up with a handful of grenades... If they're still moving after that lot, use the nuke! The blood looks and sounds disturbingly fun! 

THE MORE AWESOME YOU GET... 
The more awesome Monster Shooter gets. Complete multiple missions and improve your rankings. Buy new stuff and show your skills off to other players using the Game Center. 

WHAT'S NEXT? 
Monster Shooter is here to stay. Download the game, follow DumDum in his quest to save the kitten, shoot your way through foreign planets and have as much fun as possible! Leave the new updates, new levels and new monsters to us; just keep playing. 

Try your skill and luck in Survival mode and see if you've got what it takes to rise right up there with the leaderboard masters. See you at the top!

---

Remember to join our Fan Page on Facebook for the latest updates on our games, previews and hints: 
facebook.com/gamelion
facebook.com/monstershooter

If you're on Twitter, follow us on twitter.com/gamelion 

Contact us via email: 
support@game-lion.com

column1: US Army Sniper Shooter 3D - Commando Assassin 2017
column2:
Alpha company’s (US army Sniper Shooter Assassin) fiercest soldier private Bravo once again planning a secret mission in remote desert location. His target is to take down all the terrorists who are planning an assault against US army training facility.

Officer Bravo’s first duty is to go quietly and find the bad guys. Be careful because “zero civilian casualty” is the order from Pentagon, the US army headquarters. Now take control of the area by killing all the terrorists one by one. Since Bravo is the best sniper shooter in US army Trained camp, he will make sure that all the terrorists are killed.

This is Bravo’s many missions in which sniper enemies are his biggest threat and now his elite sniper training will be tested. The goal is simple, wipe out terrorists and trained militia groups. Load your sniper rifle gun, be a Brave commando sniper shooter and destroy all enemies before they attack on innocent citizens. 

To achieve this goal, Bravo will transform himself into a lone army survivor whose mission is to come out only as victorious by taking down enemies and its war bases. As total destruction of terrorist safe heavens will ensure the safety of the world.

US Army Sniper Shooter Features
-Army Sniper 3D Shooting   
-Frontline Survival Commando
-Prevent Terrorist Attack on US Army
-Best Sniper Shooter Game
-Challenging Black Ops Sniper Missions
-Modern Action Shooting 
-Different Sniper Guns + Grenades + Bombs

We will be very to see your feedback to improve our Sniper Shooting game for you.

SHOOTY TROOPS™ - The Endless Arcade Shooter. Pick a character and battle wave after wave of baddies on procedurally created levels. Fight tooth-and-nail through the levels with a simple pistol while keeping an eye for random weapon upgrades. Unlock characters with your earned coins, each with their own character-specific game-changing abilities like special weapons, environmental effects, speed boosts, and more. Challenging yet simplistically addicting! Your fingers will be sure to thank you.

FEATURES
- Intense Twin-Stick Shooter
- You'll never play the same game twice! 
- New characters added monthly, each with unique characteristics!
- Voxel graphics!
- Big guns, little guns and mini guns!

SHOOTY TROOPS™: http://shootytroops.com
804 Game Studios: http://804gamestudios.com
804 Game Studios on Twitter:  https://twitter.com/804GameStudios
804 Game Studios on Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/804GameStudios/

This shoting bike game is distinguished from other  racing plus shooting games simulators by a faithful reproduction of tactical maneuvers of  bike driving on detailed tracks and  bike control as well as various other shooting facets than when compared to other bike racing games.
Get ready for endless  bike racing adventure with a bit of real action and thrill on detailed tracks. Have an exciting and realistic experience of bike race with amazing superbikes, better graphics and first person view perspective as well as game's diverse camera perspectives contribute to enhance realism.
To keep things interesting, Bike Attack Race offers you various options and modes. Attack on opponent bikers using  bat or pistol to deviate their attention from race. Perform acrobatic stunts with amazing superbikes in race arena. There will be frustrating obstacles, crazy traffic, firestorm vehicles and gangsters of crime city on your way. Beware of heavy traffic on road junctions as they can smash you pretty bad. Satisfy your passion and fever towards bike racing and stunts challenge. Earn cash by winning the races. This 3D Bike racing game has various features and challenges.
 It is time to hit the roads! If you love racing games and are craving a bit of real action and thrill,  Bike Attack Race should definitely be your next move.
How to Play:
•	Tilt your device to control the bike
•	Tap Bat, Axe,  buttons to beat your opponent Bikes
•	shoot down the fire storm vehicle
•	Avoid from different obstacles and vehicles, gangsters coming towards you and gangsters with bikes
•	Avoid from accidents at road junctions
Features:
•	fast-paced two-wheeler racing action
•	Realistic 3D graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing environment of highway
•	Superb bike handling, accessible for beginners
•	Different amazing heavy sports,  Harley Bikes
•	Support for HD phone devices and tablets
•	Good quality sound effects
•	User friendly GUI and controls
•	Free Game Just Install and Enjoy..!

column1: Kids Bike Shooter : Bike Racing Shooter For Kids
column2:
Kids Bike Shooter' is an action game starring the lovable Little hero as he ride his Bike, shoots and destroys enemies and hurdles with nothing to lose! Travel through portals to visit exotic world locations, battling Enemies. 
Instantly playable and simple to control, the action speeds up and changes gears with every new world. 
Run as far as possible and shoot Enemies along the way to amass high scores and collect awards. Upload your best runs to the GameCenter leader board.

Collect Coins to unlock new characters and Powers.

Features: 

• Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls. 

• Eye popping high definition 3D graphics 

• Environments that change every few minutes you play. 

• GameCenter leaderboards, achievements and challenges 

• Easy but fun game mechanics. 

• Hours of addictive gaming!

This is a shooting game to play with both hands.
Accurately shoot a bullet with your left and right hand,  switch the weapon, aim high scores to defeat enemies within the time limit!

The enemies will run away when they reach the top.
Defeat all enemies before escape, and get the time limit bonus!

column1: Shoottris: Beyond the Classic Brick Game
column2:
Shoot the ray to give the pieces the shape that suits you.

Incredible game in which you will have to change the way you think because the pieces do not rotate. Why are they going to rotate if you can shape them as you want?

Two game modes:
- Levels: 32 levels await you. Do you think you can overcome them all?
- Resistance mode: How long and how many lines can you get? Eye, the difficulty increases with time.

With Shoottris you will enjoy a new gaming experience in an environment with 3D graphics and spectacular music.

Billiards Master is the most popular billiards game.
Sidespin, masse, jump ball, clearance with one break!
Tap and slide to aim. Drag and loose to strike. Ball potted!
Enjoy the billiard ball collision. You will be the next master of billiards! 

Features
◆ Easy to play
◆ 120 levels
◆ Many game scenes: Berlin, London, Bangkok, Riga, Bendigo.
◆ Win the championship around the world 

Snooker and 9 ball gameplay are on the way. Multiplayer online mode will be coming soon.

column1: Balloon Shooter : Show your crazy skills N pop them all
column2:
Balloon Shooter is a awesome shooting game.
You have to pop all the balloons.
Its a level based game play.
Every level has a different mechanism. To complete a level you have to follow the guidelines given at start of the level.
Every level has a specific time period and ammo, to complete the level you have to pop the required number of balloons, to earn the maximum points you have to complete the level in minimum possible time and ammo.
It has 30 awesome levels inside 10 levels are free to play and then you have to purchase the level-pack.

Features:
+=+ Awesome and challenging game play
+=+ Every level has a unique challenge.
+=+ High Resolution Graphic
+=+ D-Pad based smooth controls
+=+ 30 Unique levels
+=+ In-App based level-pack

Eggs Shooter

Let the city tremble!

The Egg Shooter has just arrived and is going to throw eggs to all those annoying neighbors.

* Arcade Game with OpenFeint and Facebook integration
* Fantastic graphics and animation.

If you want to have fun and a good time throwing eggs, you are on my team!. With enough practice and dedication you could become a Professional Eggs Shooter, like me ...

But it is not that simple. You have to consider the wind, throw power, and shoot direction to master this art.

Remember, mom's eggs are limited so don't go around wasting shoots, unless you
can find those eggs baskets that will help you replenish your stock.

Enjoy your time being bad and making a dirtier city.

Enough talk, I am throwing eggs now! Wooohoo!

enemy have envaded the City with tanks and highly trained commando .As a commando your duty to stop them,kill them and destroy them.Download this game from app store for real thrill.

Awarded 90% on Touch Arcade and 148 Apps! Blast alien hostiles into oblivion before they destroy the mining colonies, all while watching out for orbiting chunks of space rock.

 - 100's of fast paced levels packed with aliens.
 - Three game modes: Arcade, Missions & Survival.
 - Ten awesome power ups including orbital lasers.
 
This full version of Darkside features all three game modes, including 100 levels in the missions mode and smart bombs. Your purchase also helps me to write more games. Thanks : )

For more of my iOS games please visit/follow:
ClockworkPixels.com
@ClockworkPixels

- - -

"The game’s visuals are, quite simply, awesome. Each planet is highly detailed and every weapon and explosion is a dazzling treat of lighting and particle effects. I would have unequivocally recommended Darkside if it cost any reasonable amount." : Touch Arcade : 90%

"This is a fantastic twin-stick shooter, both in its free and paid versions, and if you have any kind of love for the genre then it cannot be resisted. With 100 missions to play through, and indeed missions which are challenging right from the off, Darkside is absolutely ravenous for attention." : 148 Apps : 90%

"With the use of lighting and particle effects, this is a feast for the eyes. With no barrier to entry, and no in-app purchase design model, it's easy to recommend Darkside to all fans of arcade games and twin-stick shooters." : AppSpy : 80%

"Darkside is a great-looking game, the glittering light show of explosions and weapons fire is a sight to behold." : Pocket Gamer : 80%

"Darkside is a wonderfully smooth game, with some breath-taking nebula backdrops and barely a drop in the frame-rate, even when the action is at its most frantic. There's an awful lot to love about Darkside!" : Modojo : 90%

"Get the free arcade mode. Play it for a few minutes. Shove your eyes back into your head. Buy the full game." : Arcade Life : 95%

"It's great for a quick dose of asteroid blasting and the mission mode provides a good balance to the game which should keep you coming back for more." : AppGamer : 80%

"The graphics are amazingly detailed. My thumbs are still hurting from all the dual-stick gaming I played! This game is fantastic." : App Advice : 100%

"A brilliant shoot em up that is surprisingly tactical and full of depth." : The Smart Phone App Review : 91%

2079 X is Special Edition celebrating the ten years anniversary of the original 2079.  

New features:

Bubble Shooter provides fun and addictive game play, entertainment for the whole family.

Bubbles waves keep coming down with increasing difficulty. Press green button to shoot green bubbles and red button to shoot red buttons. Use the power up to pop all the bubbles when you are in trouble by tapping on the canon.

Correct hit will pop the bubble but wrong hit will make it large and harder to pop. Addictive Fun Game.

Meet the little pony Villa. She lives in a fairy-tale world. One day, at Villa stole clothes, now to get them back, she must go on a trip to dreamland. At each level, you need to beat Villa Pony sweet charm to this sweet bubble shoot and destroy the dark magic. Win and return the stolen clothes that can dress a pony in real time and keep playing.
A snake-type game with curved motion, scorpions, misiles, and lots and lots of fun. The images in the game are a tribute to the Wixarika People.

Note Shooter is an educational game that allows players to learn their musical scales and arpeggios through a retro style shooter game. Shoot the correct notes to progress through the levels. 

Can you master all your major and minor scales and chords?

You can check answers with the"?" button, but you will lose your points. Earning high scores will allow you to unlock new guitars to control. 

This game is a great way to learn music theory and have fun at the same time!

This is the "Lite" version of Note Shooter. The full version, with over 40 levels and other features will be available pending the success of this app.

As an Indie Developer, I encourage any feedback for development in future versions of this game. RetroEd can be contacted at retroedgames@outlook.com for support.

column1: Amazing Ant POP! Bubble Shooter for Man and Kids
column2:
Amazing Ant POP! bubble shooter game is free application have fun and relaxation. 
These games can help children develop basic skills for other activities in the future.

It's super easy to start playing. Just tap the screen in the direction you want the bubble to move and aim for two or more bubbles of the same color to make them disappear and get score points. The score you get increases with the number of bubbles you make disappear at the same time.

The game includes different bonus bubbles for an enhanced strategic gameplay. Itís really simple, right? A fun game for children and of all ages.

Download it today and get in on the fun!

Save the planet from an invasion of alien robots and machines! 

Fight your metal enemies with powerful extra weapons and various vehicles (like really big tanks)!

Enjoy the console-like gaming experience with Rusty Quest's powerful dual stick controls.

Rusty Quest is an action packed jump and run shooter. A shoot'em up action game for gaming enthusiasts and hardcore gamers!


GAME FEATURES
* Play exciting levels and challenges against various rolling, floating, crawling and walking machines!
* Fight your metal enemies with cannons, lasers, grenades, gravity beams and other extra weapons!
* Drive tanks and other vehicles for increased firepower and higher speeds!
* Use the powerful dual virtual stick controls to walk, run, jump, duck, crawl, climb and shoot your way through your enemies’ lines!
* Enjoy the mesmerising sound track, powerful sound effects and awesome explosions!
* Climb the Game Center Leaderboards to compete with your friends or other players around the world!
* Play on all of your iOS devices, with game progress synchronised over iCloud!


CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you are experiencing any problems running the game, please visit us at rustyquest.com/support


STAY IN TOUCH
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/CodeHandwerker
Follow us on Twitter: @Code_Handwerker
Or send your feedback to feedback@rustyquest.com!

Grâce à l’application L-SHOOT 2000, défoulez-vous et visez juste pour motiver nos équipes !

Dans un contexte de crise économique et sociétale aussi désolant que permanent, il est bon de retrouver des fondamentaux qui permettent de faire rimer bonne humeur et incitation décomplexée à la productivité.

Un de nos graphistes tire au flan au lieu de faire des Mickeys sur Photoshop ? Lancez-lui une roquette afin qu’il retrouve le droit chemin !
Un de nos développeurs sifflote d’un air détaché au lieu de faire sa 80 000ème ligne de code de la journée ? Haro sur le malfrat ! Cliquez sur le bouton qui lui décochera une roquette bien méritée !
Un chef de projet fait mine de compulser un dossier complexe alors qu’il épluche les petites annonces du dernier numéro de «Sanglier Passion» ? Faites lui goûter le fruit de votre méthode agile : celle du lancement de missile en milieu d’entreprise.
Un directeur conseil flâne sur le web en quête de son prochain restaurant au lieu de harceler ses prospects ? Corrigez-le grâce à notre artillerie interactive !

Soyez sans pitié envers la Haute Société.
Et laissez-nous vos messages d’amour sur Twitter en utilisant le hashtag #LSHOOT2000
